required-server: You need an upload server listening at {{- url}} to receive the files...
intro: Upload multiple files with the file dialog or by dragging and dropping images onto the dashed region.
upload-disabled-title: The file selection is disabled while uploading!
page-leaving-warn-dialogue: Attention! There are still unused files in the clipboard. If you click on 'OK', the existing clipboard is automatically discarded!

file-source.no-usable-files-in-zip: ZIP file does not contain any usable files
file-source.no-usable-files-hint: Upload a ZIP file with file type(s) of
file-source.clipboard-body: Here you can choose from the previously temporarily cached files.
file-source.clipboard-no-files: There are currently no files in the clipboard.

file-sink.upload-success-body: You have successfully uploaded {{count}} file to {{name}}.
file-sink.upload-success-body_plural: You have successfully uploaded {{count}} files to {{name}}.
file-sink.save-to-clipboard-body: You have temporarily stored {{count}} file in the clipboard. Don't forget to save it permanently.
file-sink.save-to-clipboard-body_plural: You have temporarily saved {{count}} files in the clipboard. Don't forget to save them permanently.
file-sink.save-to-clipboard-text: Here you can cache files temporarily.
file-sink.save-to-clipboard-warning: Attention! When you close the browser, reload the page or add new files, the clipboard will automatically be emptied!
file-sink.clipboard-files: One file is currently available in the clipboard
file-sink.clipboard-files_plural: {{count}} files are currently available in the clipboard
file-sink.clipboard-files-overwrite: The following files will be overwritten:

nextcloud-file-picker.auth-info: A new page will open to connect your account.
nextcloud-file-picker.no-data: No data avaible in this folder.
nextcloud-file-picker.no-data-type: No data avaible in this folder.
nextcloud-file-picker.add-folder-error: The resource "{{folder}}" you tried to create already exists.
nextcloud-file-picker.replace-title-1: There is already a file with the name
nextcloud-file-picker.replace-text: What do you want to do
nextcloud-file-picker.replace-mode-all: Do this for the next conflicts
nextcloud-file-picker.readonly: You are not allowed to uploade files in this directory.
nextcloud-file-picker.onlycreate: You are only allowed to create new files in this directory.
nextcloud-file-picker.onlyedit: You are only allowed to edit files in this directory.
nextcloud-file-picker.select-all-title: Select all files in this folder

clipboard2.file-warning-body: There is still a file on the clipboard. The clipboard is discarded when you exit the page.
clipboard2.file-warning-body_plural: There are still {{count}} files on the clipboard. The clipboard is discarded when you exit the page.
clipboard2.save-files-from-clipboard: Save a file from the clipboard
clipboard2.save-from-clipboard: Save the current content from the clipboard:
clipboard2.remove-all: Remove all files from the clipboard.
clipboard2.save-all: Save all files from the clipboard
clipboard2.upload-area-text: In this area you can upload documents up to a size of 32MB via Drag & Drop or by selecting them directly.
clipboard2.clear-count-clipboard-body: One file was successfully removed from clipboard.
clipboard2.clear-count-clipboard-body_plural: {{count}} files were successfully removed from clipboard.
clipboard2.saved-files-body: A file was successfully stored temporarily in the clipboard and can now be used within this application.
clipboard2.saved-files-body_plural: {{count}} files were successfully stored temporarily in the clipboard and can now be used within this application.
clipboard2.save-count: Save one file from the clipboard
clipboard2.select-all-title: Alle verfügbaren Dateien in diesem Ordner auswählen
clipboard2.select-nothing-title: Alle gewählten Dateien nicht mehr selektieren
